00048   LaAnimalParameterManager::LaAnimalParameterManager(QPair<LaTripleMap, int> & thePair, AreaUnits & theAreaUnits, QWidget* parent, Qt::WFlags fl)
00049 : QDialog(parent,fl)
00050 {
00051   //required by Qt4 to initialise the ui
00052   setupUi(this);
00053   readSettings();
00054   lblAnimalPic->setScaledContents(true);
00055   QStringList myList;
00056   LaGrass myGrass;
00057   QStringList myMapsetList = myGrass.getMapsetList();
00058   QStringListIterator myIterator1(myMapsetList);
00059   while (myIterator1.hasNext())
00060   {
00061     //append the raster names in this mapet to our full list
00062     myList << myGrass.getRasterList(myIterator1.next());
00063   }
00064   //myGrass.getRasterList(myMapsetList);
00065   cboRaster->addItems(myList);
00066   mSelectedCropsMap = thePair.first;
00067   mCommonGrazedLandTDN = thePair.second;
00068   mCommonGrazingLandAreaUnits = theAreaUnits;
00069   sbCommonRasterTDN->setReadOnly(false);
00070   sbCommonRasterTDN->setValue(mCommonGrazedLandTDN);
00071   sbCommonRasterTDN->setReadOnly(true);
00072   connect(tblAnimalParameterProfiles, SIGNAL(cellClicked( int,int)),
00073       this, SLOT(cellClicked( int,int)));
00074   connect(cboAnimal, SIGNAL(currentIndexChanged( int)),
00075       this, SLOT(on_cboAnimal_changed( int)));
00076   //connect(pbnMore, SIGNAL(clicked()),
00077       //this, SLOT(on_pbnMore_clicked()));
00078   refreshAnimalParameterTable();
00079   //disable these buttons unless experimental is allowed
00080   pbnImport->setVisible(false);
00081   pbnExport->setVisible(false);
00082   //populate the animals combo
00083   LaUtils::AnimalMap myAnimalsMap;
00084   myAnimalsMap = LaUtils::getAvailableAnimals();
00085   QMapIterator<QString, LaAnimal> myIterator(myAnimalsMap);
00086   while (myIterator.hasNext())
00087   {
00088     myIterator.next();
00089     LaAnimal myAnimal = myIterator.value();
00090     QString myGuid = myAnimal.guid();
00091     QString myName = myAnimal.name();
00092     QIcon myIcon;
00093     myIcon.addFile(":/localdata.png");
00094     cboAnimal->addItem(myName,myGuid);
00095   }
00096   comboBoxAreaUnits->addItem("Dunum");
00097   comboBoxAreaUnits->addItem("Hectare");
00098   setFallowComboBox();
00099   populateFodder();
00100   refreshAnimalParameterTable();
00101 }

00108 void LaAnimalParameterManager::readSettings()
00109 {
00110   QSettings mySettings;
00111   QPoint pos = mySettings.value("mainwindow/pos", QPoint(200, 200)).toPoint();
00112   QSize size = mySettings.value("mainwindow/size", QSize(400, 400)).toSize();
00113   resize(size);
00114   move(pos);
00115 }
00116 
00117 void LaAnimalParameterManager::writeSettings()
00118 {
00119   QSettings mySettings;
00120   mySettings.setValue("mainwindow/pos", pos());
00121   mySettings.setValue("mainwindow/size", size());
00122 }

00124 void LaAnimalParameterManager::refreshAnimalParameterTable(QString theGuid)
00125 {
00126 
00127   mAnimalParameterMap.clear();
00128   tblAnimalParameterProfiles->clear();
00129   tblAnimalParameterProfiles->setRowCount(0);
00130   tblAnimalParameterProfiles->setColumnCount(2);
00131 
00132 
00133   //we do this in two passes
00134   //in the first pass we populate a qmap with all the animal parameters
00135   //we find....
00136   mAnimalParameterMap = LaUtils::getAvailableAnimalParameters();
00137 
00138   //the second pass populates the table
00139   //doing it from the map ensures that the rows
00140   //are sorted by animalparameter name
00141 
00142   int mySelectedRow=0;
00143   int myCurrentRow=0;
00144   QMapIterator<QString, LaAnimalParameter> myIterator(mAnimalParameterMap);
00145   while (myIterator.hasNext())
00146   {
00147     myIterator.next();
00148     LaAnimalParameter myAnimalParameter = myIterator.value();
00149     //qDebug(myAnimalParameter.toText().toLocal8Bit());
00150     if (theGuid.isEmpty())
00151     {
00152       qDebug("No default active row was requested.Assigning to myAnimalParameter.guid()!");
00153       theGuid=myAnimalParameter.guid();
00154     }
00155     if (myAnimalParameter.guid()==theGuid)
00156     {
00157       mySelectedRow=myCurrentRow;
00158     }
00159     // Insert new row ready to fill with details
00160     tblAnimalParameterProfiles->insertRow(myCurrentRow);
00161     QString myGuid = myAnimalParameter.guid();
00162     qDebug ("Inserting animalParameter into table with guid: " + myGuid.toLocal8Bit());
00163     // Add details to the new row
00164     QTableWidgetItem *mypFileNameItem= new QTableWidgetItem(myGuid);
00165     tblAnimalParameterProfiles->setItem(myCurrentRow, 0, mypFileNameItem);
00166     QTableWidgetItem *mypNameItem = new QTableWidgetItem(myAnimalParameter.name()  + "  (" + myAnimalParameter.description() + ")");
00167     tblAnimalParameterProfiles->setItem(myCurrentRow, 1, mypNameItem);
00168     //display an icon indicating if the layerset is local or remote (e.g. terralib)
00169     //LaAnimalParameter::Origin myOrigin = myAnimalParameter.origin();
00170     //if (myOrigin==LaAnimalParameter::USERPROFILE)
00171     //{
00172     QIcon myIcon;
00173     myIcon.addFile(":/localdata.png");
00174     mypNameItem->setIcon(myIcon);
00175     //}
00176     //else if (myOrigin==LaAnimalParameter::ADAPTERPROFILE)
00177     //{
00178     //QIcon myIcon;
00179     //myIcon.addFile(":/remotedata.png");
00180     //mypNameItem->setIcon(myIcon);
00181     //}
00182     //else if (myOrigin==LaAnimalParameter::UNDEFINED)
00183     //{
00184     //  mypNameItem->setTextColor(Qt::yellow);
00185     //}
00186     myCurrentRow++;
00187   }
00188 
00189   if (myCurrentRow>0)
00190   {
00191     tblAnimalParameterProfiles->setCurrentCell(mySelectedRow,1);
00192     cellClicked(mySelectedRow,1);
00193   }
00194   else
00195   {
00196     on_toolNew_clicked();
00197   }
00198   QStringList headerLabels;
00199   headerLabels << "File Name" << "Name";
00200   tblAnimalParameterProfiles->setHorizontalHeaderLabels(headerLabels);
00201   tblAnimalParameterProfiles->setColumnWidth(0,0);
00202   tblAnimalParameterProfiles->setColumnWidth(1,tblAnimalParameterProfiles->width());
00203   tblAnimalParameterProfiles->horizontalHeader()->hide();
00204   tblAnimalParameterProfiles->verticalHeader()->hide();
00205   tblAnimalParameterProfiles->horizontalHeader()->setResizeMode(1,QHeaderView::Stretch);
00206 }

00208 void LaAnimalParameterManager::populateFodder()
00209 {
00210 
00211   qDebug() << "++==++ mCropsMap line 185" << mSelectedCropsMap;
00212 
00213   tblFodder->clear();
00214   tblFodder->setRowCount(0);
00215   tblFodder->setColumnCount(3);
00216 
00217   int myCurrentRow=0;
00218   QMap<QString,LaCrop> myCropsMap;
00219   myCropsMap = LaUtils::getAvailableCrops();
00220 
00221   QMapIterator<QString, LaCrop> myIterator(myCropsMap);
00222   while (myIterator.hasNext())
00223   {
00224     myIterator.next();
00225     LaCrop myCrop = myIterator.value();
00226     QString myGuid = myCrop.guid();
00227     QString myName = myCrop.name();
00228 
00229     tblFodder->insertRow(myCurrentRow);
00230     // Add details to the new row
00231     QTableWidgetItem *mypNameItem = new QTableWidgetItem(myCrop.name());
00232 
00233     if (mSelectedCropsMap.contains(myGuid) == true)
00234     {
00235       QPair <bool, QString> myPair = mSelectedCropsMap.value(myGuid);
00236       if (myPair.first)
00237       {
00238         QIcon myIcon;
00239         myIcon.addFile(":/status_ok.png");
00240         mypNameItem->setIcon(myIcon);
00241       }
00242       else
00243       {
00244         QIcon myIcon;
00245         myIcon.addFile(":/status_error.png");
00246         mypNameItem->setIcon(myIcon);
00247       }
00248     }
00249     else
00250     {
00251       QIcon myIcon;
00252       myIcon.addFile(":/status_error.png");
00253       mypNameItem->setIcon(myIcon);
00254     }
00255 
00256     mypNameItem->setCheckState(Qt::Unchecked);
00257     mypNameItem->setData(Qt::UserRole,myGuid);
00258     tblFodder->setItem(myCurrentRow, 0, mypNameItem);
00259     //mypNameItem->setIcon(myIcon);
00260     //create a var to hold the percentage for each selected parameter
00261     //add the crop parameters combo to the form
00262     QSpinBox * mypSpinFodder = new QSpinBox(this);
00263     //mypSpinFodder->addItem(myParameterName,myParameterGuid);
00264     QSpinBox * mypSpinGrain = new QSpinBox(this);
00265 
00266     const int myDefaultFodderValue=0;
00267     const int myDefaultGrainValue=0;
00268 
00269     mypSpinFodder->setValue(myDefaultFodderValue);
00270     mypSpinGrain->setValue(myDefaultGrainValue);
00271 
00272     //myCropsMap[myGuid]=myValue;
00273     tblFodder->setCellWidget ( myCurrentRow, 1, mypSpinFodder);
00274     tblFodder->setCellWidget ( myCurrentRow, 2, mypSpinGrain);
00275 
00276     myCurrentRow++;
00277   }
00278 }
00279 
00280 void LaAnimalParameterManager::refreshFodderTable(QString theGuid)
00281 {
00282   LaFoodSourceMap myFoodSourceMap = mAnimalParameter.fodderSourceMap();
00283   qDebug("Restoring " + QString::number(myFoodSourceMap.count()).toLocal8Bit()
00284     + " food sources into animal parameter.");
00285   for (int myCurrentRow=0; myCurrentRow < tblFodder->rowCount(); myCurrentRow++)
00286   {
00287     QTableWidgetItem * mypItem = tblFodder->item(myCurrentRow,0);
00288     QString myGuid = mypItem->data(Qt::UserRole).toString();
00289     qDebug("tblFodderGuid: " + myGuid.toLocal8Bit());
00290     QSpinBox * mypFodderSpinBox = qobject_cast <QSpinBox *> (tblFodder->cellWidget(myCurrentRow,1));
00291     QSpinBox * mypGrainSpinBox = qobject_cast <QSpinBox *> (tblFodder->cellWidget(myCurrentRow,2));
00292     if (myFoodSourceMap.key().contains(myGuid))
00293     {
00294       LaFoodSource myFoodSource = myFoodSourceMap.value(myGuid);
00295       int myFodderValue = myFoodSource.fodder();
00296       int myGrainValue = myFoodSource.grain();
00298       qDebug("value from map for myFodderValue: " + QString::number(myFodderValue).toLocal8Bit());
00299       qDebug("value from map for myGrainValue: " + QString::number(myGrainValue).toLocal8Bit());
00300       mypFodderSpinBox->setValue(myFodderValue);
00301       mypGrainSpinBox->setValue(myGrainValue);
00302       mypItem->setCheckState(Qt::Checked);
00303       qDebug("++++ Crop Guid in fodder Table: " + myGuid.toLocal8Bit());
00304       //Q_ASSERT(mySelectedCropsMap.contains(myGuid));
00305       //QString myGuidFromSelectedMap = mySelectedCropsMap.value(myGuid);
00306       //qDebug("++-- Crop Guid from selected map: " + myGuidFromSelectedMap.toLocal8Bit());
00307       //qDebug() << "++-- Crop Guid from selected map:" << myGuidFromSelectedMap;
00308     }
00309     else
00310     {
00311       mypFodderSpinBox->setValue(0);
00312       mypGrainSpinBox->setValue(0);
00313       mypItem->setCheckState(Qt::Unchecked);
00314     }
00315 
00316   }
00317 }

00319 void LaAnimalParameterManager::cellClicked(int theRow, int theColumn)
00320 {
00321   //note we use the alg name not the id becuase user may have customised params
00322   //qDebug("LaAnimalParameterManager::cellClicked");
00323   QString myGuid = tblAnimalParameterProfiles->item(tblAnimalParameterProfiles->currentRow(),0)->text();
00324   //qDebug("Guid is: " + myGuid.toLocal8Bit());
00325   QString myFileName = myGuid + ".xml";
00326   selectAnimalParameter(myFileName);
00327 }
00328 void LaAnimalParameterManager::selectAnimalParameter(QString theFileName)
00329 {
00330   //qDebug("selectAnimalParameter Called : " + theFileName.toLocal8Bit());
00331   QString myAnimalParameterDir = LaUtils::userAnimalParameterProfilesDirPath();
00332   mAnimalParameter.fromXmlFile(myAnimalParameterDir + QDir::separator() + theFileName);
00333   //
00334   //for debuggin only:
00335   //
00336   qDebug("-- Restoring " + QString::number(mAnimalParameter.fodderSourceMap().count()).toLocal8Bit()
00337     + " food sources into animal parameter.");
00338   // end of deub section
00339   showAnimalParameter();
00340 }
00341 
00342 void LaAnimalParameterManager::showAnimalParameter()
00343 {
00344   leName->setText(mAnimalParameter.name());
00345   leDescription->setText(mAnimalParameter.description());
00346   setComboToDefault(cboAnimal, mAnimalParameter.animalGuid());
00347   sbPercentTameMeat->setValue(mAnimalParameter.percentTameMeat());
00348   checkBoxCommonRaster->setChecked(mAnimalParameter.useCommonGrazingLand());
00349   checkBoxSpecificRaster->setChecked(mAnimalParameter.useSpecificGrazingLand());
00350   sbSpecificRasterTDN->setValue(mAnimalParameter.TDNSpecificGrazingLand());
00351   sbCommonRasterTDN->setValue(mCommonGrazedLandTDN);
00352   comboBoxAreaUnits->setCurrentIndex(mAnimalParameter.areaUnits());
00353   grpFodderUse->setChecked(mAnimalParameter.fodderUse());
00354 
00355   refreshFodderTable();
00356 
00357   if (mAnimalParameter.fallowUsage()==High)
00358   {
00359     setComboToDefault(comboBoxFallowUsage,tr("High"));
00360   }
00361   else if (mAnimalParameter.fallowUsage()==Medium)
00362   {
00363     setComboToDefault(comboBoxFallowUsage,tr("Medium"));
00364   }
00365   else if (mAnimalParameter.fallowUsage()==Low)
00366   {
00367     setComboToDefault(comboBoxFallowUsage,tr("Low"));
00368   }
00369   else
00370   {
00371     setComboToDefault(comboBoxFallowUsage,tr("None"));
00372   }
00373 
00374   //leRasterName->setText(mAnimalParameter.rasterName());
00375 }

00393 void LaAnimalParameterManager::on_toolCopy_clicked()
00394 {
00395   qDebug("Copy toolbutton clicked");
00396   if (tblAnimalParameterProfiles->currentRow() < 0)
00397   {
00398     return;
00399   }
00400   //to clone, we get the algorithm guid that is currently selected
00401   QString myGuid = tblAnimalParameterProfiles->item(tblAnimalParameterProfiles->currentRow(),0)->text();
00402   if (myGuid.isEmpty())
00403   {
00404     return;
00405   }
00406   QString myOriginalFileName = LaUtils::userAnimalParameterProfilesDirPath() + QDir::separator() + myGuid + ".xml";
00407   LaAnimalParameter myAnimalParameter;
00408   myAnimalParameter.fromXmlFile(myOriginalFileName);
00409   /*
00410   int myCount = 1;
00411   while (mAnimalParameter.contains(myProfileName))
00412   {
00413     myProfileName = tr("Copy ") + QString::number(myCount++) + " of " + myAnimalParameter.name();
00414   }
00415   */
00416   //assign this layerset its own guid
00417   myAnimalParameter.setGuid();
00418   QString myNewFileName = LaUtils::userAnimalParameterProfilesDirPath() + QDir::separator() + myAnimalParameter.guid() + ".xml";
00419   myAnimalParameter.setName(tr("Copy of ") + myAnimalParameter.name());
00420   myAnimalParameter.toXmlFile(myNewFileName);
00421   refreshAnimalParameterTable(myAnimalParameter.guid());
00422   refreshFodderTable();
00423 }
00424 void LaAnimalParameterManager::on_toolDelete_clicked()
00425 {
00426   qDebug("Delete toolbutton clicked");
00427   if (tblAnimalParameterProfiles->currentRow() < 0)
00428   {
00429     return;
00430   }
00431   QString myGuid = tblAnimalParameterProfiles->item(tblAnimalParameterProfiles->currentRow(),0)->text();
00432   if (!myGuid.isEmpty())
00433   {
00434     QFile myFile(LaUtils::userAnimalParameterProfilesDirPath() + QDir::separator() + myGuid + ".xml");
00435     if (!myFile.remove())
00436     {
00437       QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Landuse Analyst"),
00438       tr("Unable to delete file \n") + myFile.fileName());
00439     }
00440     refreshAnimalParameterTable();
00441     refreshFodderTable();
00442   }
00443 }

00447   LaAnimal myAnimal = LaUtils::getAnimal(cboAnimal->itemData(cboAnimal->currentIndex(),Qt::UserRole).toString());

00450 }

00456 }
00457 
00458 void LaAnimalParameterManager::on_pbnApply_clicked()
00459 {
00460   mAnimalParameter.setName(leName->text());
00461   mAnimalParameter.setDescription(leDescription->text());
00462   mAnimalParameter.setAnimalGuid(cboAnimal->itemData(cboAnimal->currentIndex(),Qt::UserRole).toString());
00463   mAnimalParameter.setPercentTameMeat(sbPercentTameMeat->value());
00464   mAnimalParameter.setUseCommonGrazingLand(checkBoxCommonRaster->isChecked());
00465   mAnimalParameter.setUseSpecificGrazingLand(checkBoxSpecificRaster->isChecked());
00466 
00467   QString mySelectedAreaUnit = QString(comboBoxAreaUnits->currentText());
00468   AreaUnits myAreaUnits;
00469   if (mySelectedAreaUnit == "Dunum")
00470   {
00471     myAreaUnits = Dunum;
00472     mAnimalParameter.setAreaUnits(myAreaUnits);
00473   }
00474   else if (mySelectedAreaUnit == "Hectare")
00475   {
00476     myAreaUnits = Hectare;
00477     mAnimalParameter.setAreaUnits(myAreaUnits);
00478   }
00479 
00480   mAnimalParameter.setTDNCommonGrazingLand(sbCommonRasterTDN->value());
00481   mAnimalParameter.setTDNSpecificGrazingLand(sbSpecificRasterTDN->value());
00482   mAnimalParameter.setFodderUse(grpFodderUse->isChecked());
00483 
00484   // populate the fodder map from the table.
00485   LaFoodSourceMap myFoodSourceMap;
00486   int myRowCount = tblFodder->rowCount();
00487   for (int myCurrentRow=0; myCurrentRow < myRowCount; ++myCurrentRow)
00488   {
00489 
00490     QTableWidgetItem * mypNameWidget =
00491       tblFodder->item(myCurrentRow,0);
00492     QSpinBox * mypFodderSpinBox =
00493       qobject_cast<QSpinBox *>
00494       (tblFodder->cellWidget(myCurrentRow,1));
00495     QSpinBox * mypGrainSpinBox =
00496       qobject_cast<QSpinBox *>
00497       (tblFodder->cellWidget(myCurrentRow,2));
00498 
00499     //dont bother doing anything further if the
00500     //first widget in the row is not checked
00501     if (!mypNameWidget->checkState())
00502     {
00503       continue;
00504     }
00505     LaFoodSource myFoodSource;
00506     myFoodSource.setFodder(mypFodderSpinBox->value());
00507     myFoodSource.setGrain(mypGrainSpinBox->value());
00508     QString myGuid = mypNameWidget->data(Qt::UserRole).toString();
00509 
00510     myFoodSourceMap.insert(myGuid, myFoodSource);
00511 
00512   }
00513 
00514   qDebug("Inserting " + QString::number(myFoodSourceMap.count()).toLocal8Bit()
00515     + " food sources into animal parameter.");
00516   mAnimalParameter.setFodderData(myFoodSourceMap);
00517 
00518 
00519 
00520   QString myFallowUsage = QString(comboBoxFallowUsage->currentText());
00521   //setFallowComboBox();
00522   Priority myPriority;
00523   if (myFallowUsage == "HIGH Fallow Priority")
00524   {
00525       myPriority = High;
00526       mAnimalParameter.setFallowUsage(myPriority);
00527   }
00528   else if (myFallowUsage == "MED Fallow Priority")
00529   {
00530       myPriority = Medium;
00531       mAnimalParameter.setFallowUsage(myPriority);
00532   }
00533   else if (myFallowUsage == "LOW Fallow Priority")
00534   {
00535       myPriority = Low;
00536       mAnimalParameter.setFallowUsage(myPriority);
00537   }
00538   else
00539   {
00540       myPriority = None;
00541       mAnimalParameter.setFallowUsage(myPriority);
00542   }
00543   mAnimalParameter.setRasterName(cboRaster->currentText());
00544   mAnimalParameter.toXmlFile( LaUtils::userAnimalParameterProfilesDirPath() +
00545       QDir::separator() + mAnimalParameter.guid() + ".xml");
00546   refreshAnimalParameterTable(mAnimalParameter.guid());
00547   refreshFodderTable();
00548 }
00549 
00550 void LaAnimalParameterManager::setSelectedCropsMap(LaTripleMap theSelectedCropsMap)
00551 {
00552   mSelectedCropsMap = theSelectedCropsMap;
00553 }
00554 
00555 bool LaAnimalParameterManager::setComboToDefault(QComboBox * thepCombo, QString theDefault)
00556 {
00557   if (!theDefault.isEmpty())
00558   {
00559     //loop through list looking for a match
00560     for ( int myCounter = 0; myCounter < thepCombo->count(); myCounter++ )
00561     {
00562       thepCombo->setCurrentIndex(myCounter);
00563 
00564       if (thepCombo->itemData(myCounter,Qt::UserRole)==theDefault)
00565       {
00566         break;
00567       }
00568     }
00569   }
00570   else
00571   {
00572     return false;
00573   }
00574   return true;
00575 }
00576 
00577 void LaAnimalParameterManager::setFallowComboBox()
00578 {
00579   comboBoxFallowUsage->addItem("Do Not Graze Fallow", "None");
00580   comboBoxFallowUsage->addItem("HIGH Fallow Priority", "High");
00581   comboBoxFallowUsage->addItem("MED Fallow Priority", "Medium");
00582   comboBoxFallowUsage->addItem("LOW Fallow Priority", "Low");
